12.content:
"Don't wander off too far now May!" Ash called, as his friend May was leaving the camp site to take a walk.

"Don't worry!" She called back, "I won't! Take care of my pokemon while I'm gone!" After recieving a nod from her friend, May than began to walk deep into the forest. It was only until she was some ways away from the camp, when a can of sleeping gas was thrown in front of her, making the young brown haired girl fall asleep.

Two hours later, May awoke from her slumber, only to find herself in a sitting position, hands tied behind her back, and her feet bare and in a set of stocks.

"What in the world?!" May shrieked, as she tried to struggle.

"Well, well well, if it isn't the perky girl twerp," Gasping, May looked in front of her, only to see Meowth standing right there.

"Meowth! I should've known! What do you want from me?!" May hissed at the cat pokemon.

"That's an easy one," Meowth smirked, "I want info on how to get Pikachu, and YOU'RE gonna tell me how to do it!" After he finished, he saw May giving him a dirty look.

"Oh yeah? What makes you think I'm gonna tell YOU anything?" She spat.

"Oh... you'll talk girly," He smiled, while going over to her bare feet, and gently stroked up heh left sole with a single claw. May eyes widened, and she let out a shreik of laughter as the claw continued to stroke her left sole slowly and gently.

"Just what I was hoping for," Meowth smirked, as he continued to stroke May's bare foot, making her continue to laugh like crazy, "I got the most ticklish of the bunch,"

"You know what ta do ta make it stop!" Meowth taunted. He loved using villanous one-liners, and it was a welcome change of pace from the pathetic, subserviant monologues he and his human partners usually said. In fact, he was feeling quite high and mighty by this time. Two random (and most likely perverted) pokemon were obeying his every command, and he was using them to torture the female "twerp" into giving up the location of a certain electric rodent. May wasn't going to do down easily, however...

"Never! You can keep me here all day long, and I won't tell you anything!" Of course, this was a ruse. Only a thin sheet of cotton in the middle of her widely spread legs separated Meowth and the other pokemon from her most special place. What was worse, the psychic pokemon had the girl locked in place; she needed a will more powerful than the psychic pokemon to move again.

In this helpless, embarassing state, the ghost pokemon hovered over May's legs. A pitiful whine escaped her lips as Haunter's hands moved to her inner thighs. The girl's eyes widened when the ghost let its unrealistically long tongue roll out onto the ground. Without any ability to thrash around, "all day long" seemed more like "forever and a day." What as about to take place would not be pleasant in the least.

"How's that feel, May? Wanna make it stop?" Meowth teased the girl as shocked laughter mixed with moans. Without the cotton to act as a barrier, the ghost's long, wet tongue could slip and slide over every bump and fold of May's personal area. However, the cat pokemon deemed the violating tongue to be less than effective at driving the girl mad with torture. If anything, she would overcome her shock and become pleasured by it.

So, if Haunter was bent on assaulting his helpless captive with pleasure, Meowth and his psychic counterpart would torture her with intense tickling.Meowth motioned to the psychic pokemon, and, reading his thoughts, the psion plucked several more blades of grass. These blades were formed into doughnut-like spining discs, and the holes placed over the girl's erect nipples. May, taking notice of this new stimulus even through Haunter's teasing, began to grit her teeth. She would have liked to contract the muscles of her torso to shrink away from the whirling vegatation, but the psychic still had control of her movements.

Meowth noticed a more vivid blush upon May's face, and decided to take a bit of the action for himself. The psychic pokemon began moving the discs of grass up down over May's breasts, bringing more hard laughter over the moans and giggles from Haunter's attack on her personal area. Meowth brandished his claws, and with the exact opposite of the force he used to remove her clothes, tickled her stomach and sides. The minute, yet paradoxically prevalent points of pressure on May's midriff drove her over the edge.

"NOHIAHAHAHAHAHIHAHAAA!!! STIAHAHAHA!!" May lost her ability to make coherent pleas when Meowth began to scratch just under the waistband of panties while dipping his rough, feline tongue into her navel. Her face, a product of the slithering thing between her legs and the grass blades brushing her chest, was now beet red and covered in sweat. In a few more moments, every ounce of that pent up energy would be driven from her body, and it would take her strength and resistance with it. When that happened, Meowth would win. The benefits his boss would give him for the capture of Pikachu would outweigh all all the years of struggle he went through; and, if everything went according to his wishes, May would be the Rocket Trio's personal slave until the day she died.

133.content:
Jessie was in her team rocket outfit that exposed her tummy, but her long black boots were on and her tee shirt hid her arm pits. Her boots were in stocks and her arms were hung over her head leaving her pale white belly laid out. Out if the corner came Ash with Pikachu on his shoulder. Behind him in the shadows of the room stood Brock and Misty with evil smirks on their faces.

"Hello Jessie" Ash said casually with a bit of revenge in his attitude. "Let me go you twerps, Why'd you trap me!" Jessie exclaimed as she tried to break her wrists free from the locks above her head.

Misty stepped out of the shadows. "We tried to catch James and Meowth but you were sleeping so peaceful in the forest it was easiest to capture you and hope they come after you" the red head explained with some attitude in her tone. Jessie showed frustration on her face. "Why you little brats, why'd you trap me in the first place!" Jessie demanded.

"You know the where abouts of Team Rocket Headquarters, if you tell us where it is Ash will be able to get his 8th badge in Kanto and stop you guys for good" Brock stated.

Jessie let out a laugh of insult. "Ha! You twerps think I'll tell, forget it, no head quarters no job for me" Jessie said with a grin on her face.

Just then Pikachu leaped off Ash's shoulder and plopped gently on Jessie's bare stomach. His little yellow paws pattered on her pale belly as she looked down frustratingly losing her grin as her belly quivered. "Pikachu!" Pikachu peeped.

Ash stepped forward to Jessie's boots. "If you won't say now you can end a night of pure torture" Ash recommended as he placed a shoulder on the stocks. "No way twerp! There's no way you can make me talk!" Jessie declared as she lifted her head high keeping an arrogant look on.

"Alright then, you asked for it" Ash added. He took a sudden tug of the heel of her black left boot as it slipped off revealing a white size 8 bare foot with pink painted toes.

"What are you doing you pervert" Jessie demanded as her foot grew cold. He then tugged off the other revealing an identical right foot.

"What are you doing!" Jessie insisted as her feet remained still.

Ash took a index finger and stroked from the bottom to the top her left foot. It flinched and shuttered as she jerked back slightly. "What are you doing!" she continued to ask compliantly as Ash took another stroke up the left arch. Her pink toes wiggled as she bit her lip realizing that Ash's goal was to tickle her. She struggled to keep a serious expression refusing to reveal she was deep down EXTREMELY ticklish, especially on her long feet.

Ash . . .
